title: [GAMEPLAY] Queen of Diamonds Syndra facial animation
body:
Every other Syndra's skins have the facial animation, base skin too, but this skin doesn't have it. 

1. Select in champion selection Syndra
2. Take her skin Queen of Diamonds
3. How you can see in game she doesn't have any facial animation

I don't know if riot missed the facial animation or they didn't wanted it in Syndra Queen of Diamonds but I thought was better report it.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! This is working as intended.
